name: Dimensions (itch) (Pixel Paras)
description:
DOWNLOAD THE GAME TO HAVE THE COMPLETE EXPERIENCE WEBGL IS DEMO

Welcome to dimensions a game where you travel through different dimensions as Mira

Controls

+ WASD / Arrow keys 

+ Shift to dash

+ Space to Jump / Double jump

Story

The game has 2 different endings depending upon your choices in the dialogues in dave The theme of the jam was 'Less is More' and the way this game fits it is quite abstract Spoiler Alert in the story the player progressively realizes the greed she had for visiting new dimensions but this leads to a file corruption in 4th dimensions causing her to realize how the fewer dimensions she lived in was better.
